meanings.definition: The beliefs, practices, or characteristics of a boss.
meanings.sent1: In the office, we can see his bossisms in action every day.
meanings.sent2: She adopted some of the bossisms from her supervisor to become a better leader.
meanings.sent3: His bossisms make him stand out as a leader among his peers.
meanings.sent4: The bossisms of the CEO guide the company towards success.
meanings.sent5: Learning the bossisms of effective leadership is crucial for career growth.

meanings.definition: The mannerisms or behaviors typical of a boss.
meanings.sent1: Observing his bossisms, I could tell he was in charge.
meanings.sent2: Her bossisms include a confident stride and a firm handshake.
meanings.sent3: His bossisms sometimes make us chuckle during team meetings.
meanings.sent4: The bossisms of authority were evident in his every move.
meanings.sent5: She mimicked the bossisms of her manager to appear more authoritative.

meanings.definition: A collection of sayings or phrases used by a boss.
meanings.sent1: The bossisms he often repeats have become office jokes.
meanings.sent2: Her bossisms include motivational quotes and team-building phrases.
meanings.sent3: We all know the bossisms he uses when he's trying to inspire us.
meanings.sent4: The bossisms in his speeches always leave a lasting impact on the team.
meanings.sent5: Memorizing the bossisms of successful leaders can help in one's own career.
